The advisory tweets now excerpts from the speech of the president during the launch of the Agricultural and Livestock Plan 2015/16. #PlanoSafra
RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo President @dilmabr addresses the launch of #PlanoSafra 2015-2016: http://t.co/N8fWsWaZvo
Once again, we guarantee adequate financing conditions for agribusiness, which segment is a priority for Brazil. #PlanoSafra
Even though we are living in a conjuncture of adjustments, we have made great effort and we are increasing in 20% the resources to finance the next harvest.
It will be R $ 187.7 billion to increase agricultural production and supply both domestic and foreign markets. #PlanoSafra
As in previous harvests, we will continue to expand our support to middle-sized producers. #PlanoSafra
The volume of funds for #Pronamp will be raised to R $ 18.9 billion, with a 25% increase in the funding limit for costing. #PlanoSafra
We persist in our strategy of creating a strong rural middle class, anchored in a competitive and sustainable production. #PlanoSafra
We are making adjustments in the economy, especially in federal government spending. #PlanoSafra
RT @WhiteHouse: “One of my core principles is that I will never engage in a politics in which I’m trying to divide people” —@POTUS http://t…
The common goal of all measures is to improve the economic environment and strengthen confidence in the country (...)
(...) for Brazil to grow again in the shortest possible time. #PlanoSafra
We are building a growth agenda, of which this Agricultural and Livestock Plan is one of the components. #PlanoSafra
We are working to stimulate investment and production, to resume growth on a sustainable basis. #PlanoSafra
With this #PlanoSafra, with the new concessions in infrastructure, with the Exportation Plan and with the Agricultural Defense Plan (...)
(...) we are composing a broad agenda of sustainable growth. #PlanoSafra
These initiatives will be joined by #PlanoSafra da Agricultura Familiar and #MCMV 3.
We are working to bring Brazil back on an accelerated growth path, and we want this to happen in the shortest time possible.
We are showing, with concrete actions, that Brazil at the same time makes adjustments and has a very clear agenda for the future. #PlanoSafra
Today, we produce food in quantity and quality p /, with fair prices, guarantee the food security of our population. #PlanoSafra
We are becoming the food barn of the world, and this should be a source of pride for all. #PlanoSafra
I congratulate the agribusiness producers. We hit a new soybean export record. The victory of a segment is the victory of Brazil.
